p.b: North Iowa School is following Iowa Governor's order for school closure through the end of this school year.

span.strong: We are continuing online education at this time:Â REQUIRED SCHOOL COVID-19 FAQS

p.b: Our lunch program is offering free meals for children - call the school to be included.
The Wellness Center is closed until further notice.
